lexUnit.name: rehearsal.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a trial performance of a play or other work for later public performance

sentence.text: After a dress rehearsal for a Symphony Hour show , I suggested , as producer , that in the adagio movement of the main symphonic item the violins had been taking the tempo slightly too fast .
